meaning: to bore, to puncture, to lance, to prick, to perforate, to give a waffle pattern, to groove, to give a tread, to granulate, to embroider
to unsheathe (sword), to draw, to extend, to raise, to hold in position for use (weapon, musical instrument)
to rest, to repose; obs. to stop, to live comfortably, to rest
to become angry, to be disturbed; obs. to disturb, to make chaotic, to agitate, to make angry, to riot
to dip, to mix, to smear, to macerate, to welter, to impregnate, to pollute
to impregnate, to mix, to taint, to pollute, to contaminate; obs. to become wet
lit. to stuff, to fill, to pack; obs. to imbue, to collect, to bury
lit. to stuff, to fill, to pack; obs. to imbue, to collect, to bury (variant of āgandan)
obs. to unsheathe (sword), to draw, to extend, to raise, to hold in position for use, to draw out, to pull off, to raise
